name: Spell Hoodie
description: Lookin' hotter than infernal hellfire; the 'Misha' monokini swimsuit makes an effortless statement at the beach or pool alike. Soft-touch nylon fabric for a light and airy fit, with superior comfort matched with extra low-cut front with statement pentagram hardware and studded details. With halterneck back and cut-out sides. Hell yesssss!
